content: vanilla is both basic and essential it can shine by itself or enhance other flavours in a dish similarly a vanilla sock pattern is the most essential basic ready to shine in its simplicity with tonal colours or show off the most wild and complex variegated yarns whether you re new to sock knitting or are looking for a simple pattern to knit on vacation the vanilla beans socks are ready for you the vanilla beans pattern is also available for free on my blog 1 **sizes** there are four sizes in the pattern 1 18cm foot circumference 2 20cm foot circumference 3 22 5cm foot circumference and 4 25cm foot circumference note that the sizes listed are measured around the sock so find your size by measuring your foot and then subtracting 10% **yarn and yardage** this pattern uses a fingering weight sock yarn and needs approximately 220 - 320 yards the simple stockinette of the vanilla beans socks make it well suited to tonal speckled or variegated colourways **notions** needles dpn s or circulars darning needle stitch markers and sock blockers if desired **techniques** the vanilla beans socks are knit cuff down in the round with a heel flap and gusset and a wedge toe this pattern is suitable for knitters who are at least slightly familiar with cuff down in the round sock construction __ la vanille est à la fois basique et essentielle elle peut briller seule ou
